# Testing Link Citations with Margin Citations

LINK-TEST: With `link-citations: true`, inline citations should be hyperlinked to the bibliography [@borges1941library].

The margin note should also contain the full citation [@eco1980name].

This tests whether link-citations interacts correctly with margin citation placement [@calvino1979winter].
